department.en: International Master of Business Administration program
department.ch: 國際經營管理碩士學位學程

goal.en: "This course which is mainly designed for graduate students focuses on introducing theory of investments, reading related journal papers, and discussion. Students can obtain core and advanced knowledge of investments. Furthermore, by reading related journal papers, they can understand the applications of these knowledge and try to find their research topics on master thesis."
goal.ch: 本課程主要針對碩士班以上之學生設計，著重投資學核心理論介紹、期刊文獻閱讀以及討論。學生可透過此課程獲得投資學之核心與進階知識，以及透過閱讀相關期刊文獻了解其應用，另外也可進一步嘗試從中尋找論文研究方向。

content.en:
"1.Introductions of core and advanced theory of investment, including: risk and returns, diversification, CAPM, APT, efficient market hypothesis, behavioral finance, and investment performance evaluation.
2.Reading and discussion of related journal papers."
content.ch:
1.核心與進階投資學理論介紹：風險與報酬、多元投資、資本資產定價模型、套利定價理論、效率市場假說、行為財務學以及投資績效衡量。
2.相關期刊文獻閱讀與討論。

textbook.en: "1. Zvi Bodie, Alan J. Marcus, and Alex Kane, “Essentials of Investments”, 2022(12e), McGraw Hill Education (Dealer: Hwa-Tai Publishing). 2. Zvi Bodie, Alan J. Marcus, and Alex Kane, “Investments”, 2021 (12e), McGraw Hill Education (Dealer: Hwa-Tai Publishing). 3. Related journal papers."
textbook.ch: "1. Zvi Bodie, Alan J. Marcus, and Alex Kane, “Essentials of Investments”, 2022 (12e), McGraw Hill Education (華泰文化代理). 2. Zvi Bodie, Alan J. Marcus, and Alex Kane, “Investments”, 2021 (12e), McGraw Hill Education (華泰文化代理). 3. 相關期刊文獻。"

grading.en: "Midterm presentation: 30%; Final presentation: 40%; Class participation: 30%, including: discussion 20% and attendance 10%."

flex_desc.en: "Additional course discussion or paper presentation could be arranged if required."
flex_desc.ch: "視課程進度需要，可安排額外課程討論或報告。"
